Reviews.Title: efficient laptop
Reviews.Author: rich
Reviews.Content: excellent value on this small light weight laptop. it fits into my soft brief case easily. It is perfect as a travelling laptop. screen  is vivid, keyboard fits and feels good to the touch. speed is adequate but ok for my use. i purchased a clear plastic cover that fits snugly and protects the surface from scratches. I would recommend as a decent quality laptop in the lower price range.

Reviews.Title: Great and Affordable Ultrabook
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my bulky and heavy Dell (older) laptop that I take to work. That laptop used to be the the top of the line  ($1800) laptop and was constantly concerned that it would be taken or broken so I bought this one since it was fairly cheap (<$400) and it would take up less space. I am just a casual computer user so the specs don't really concern me but I can say it is a fast and lightweight ultrabook. I use it mainly for web surfing and school work. This model doesn't have a media drive which doesn't bother me because now most music or media is in cloud or streamed. The keyboard is comfortable for my large hands. The speakers are decent for listening to music while you work or play which is exactly what I am doing now while typing this review. I read some of the online reviews and they mentioned how the case seems cheap but for my first non metal case laptop I am impressed. It is light, it seems sturdy, quiet (no rattles or groaning), and nice matte finish cover. All in all a really nice ultra book for those who are on a budget who want something that is speedy and looks nice.The only con is that the battery doesn't last as long as I am accustomed but I can tweak the settings and should be able to extend that.

Reviews.Title: She loves it
Reviews.Author: Smoothdark "smoothdark"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product to replace a Dell laptop for my wife. So far so good! She is happy with it. It's very lightweight, and has a full size keyboard however it does not have a disk drive, so you may need to get an attachment.

Reviews.Title: Great Backup Computer
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Rogers
Reviews.Content: This should be a back up computer for your desktop or more powerful laptop. It's lightweight and you can tell where costs have been cut like the keyboard but all if you need more than a tablet, this laptop is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Better than I've expected
Reviews.Author: S. M. Bueno "smihich"
Reviews.Content: Great little computer. Bought it for my mom and followed the tips of buying this version instead of the one with Windows 8. It has been working flawlessly. The color it's also better than what I thought it would be. Very, very happy with this choice. I totally recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very frustrated
Reviews.Author: Henry "Henry"
Reviews.Content: Bought this computer for just two month and got it broken without any reasons.  It can not be rebooted. Very frustrated. Checked the problem online and lot of people had similar problem.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i3-2377M Processor, 1.40GHz, 4GB, 320GB and 20GB solid state drive
802.11b/g/n Wireless Lan, Bluetooth, Webcam
13.3" HD CineCrystal LED-backlit display
Windows 7 Home Premium 64bit
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Aspire S3-391-6616 13-Inch Ultrabook (Intel i3-2377M Core Processor, Windows 7 Home Premium)
